channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Behind the Curtain — Jensen vs. Dario: "There will be more jobs"
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, bristling at Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei's warning of a looming white-collar apocalypse , tells Axios that artificial intellig...

item.description: President Trump and Sen. Dave McCormick (R-Pa.) will use a first-of-its-kind innovation summit in Pennsylvania on Tuesday to announce $70 billion in A...

item.title: 3 ways Trump might try to defuse the Epstein mess

item.title: A House Democrat is floating a radical new solution to Congress' age problem

item.title: New Medicaid work rules put states in a bind
item.description: The new Medicaid work rules in President Trump's tax-and-spending law put states on a tight timetable for setting up systems to notify millions of rec...

item.title: Floods put Abbott, a disaster veteran, at crossroads of Trump’s FEMA rebrand
item.description: The Trump administration has heralded Texas as the kind of partner it wants in overhauling FEMA.

item.title: King Charles III to host Trump in September for second U.K. state visit
item.description: Buckingham Palace confirmed that the president had accepted the king’s invitation to visit from Sept. 17-19. He and the first lady will be hosted at W...

item.title: When will Trump’s ‘big’ tax law take effect? Here’s what to expect.
item.description: Key provisions in the president’s signature legislation will take effect at different times over several years.

item.title: Under Trump, the government mobilizes in response to fringe theories
item.description: Trump officials have assigned government workers and spent taxpayer dollars to address conspiracy theories and easily-disproven assertions.

item.title: Senate report details failures ahead of Trump assassination attempt
item.description: The document outlines what the committee chairman regarded as scant disciplinary action after the shortcomings at the Pennsylvania rally last year.

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
